text:
Gemayel will draw a "political and constitutional roadmap to get out of the crisis"
06 Nov 2019, 07:55 by Lebanon 24
The head of the Phalange Party, MP Sami Gemayel, will draw a political and constitutional roadmap out of the crisis at a press conference tomorrow, stressing that the victory that was achieved is a victory for the people and Lebanon in the 100th anniversary of the declaration of the State of Greater Lebanon. Gemayel will address the "attacks on demonstrators and protesters" before Hariri announced his resignation. He will be reassured that "neither intimidation of chaos on the ground can change people's attitudes, nor intimidation of emptiness is based on any constitutional dimension, but is a means of pressure exerted by the pillars of the staggering settlement system in a cynicism to not recognize failure and imminent fall."
